trainings.name: Base Endurance Ride
trainings.description: 2-hour Z2 ride. Focus on steady, comfortable pacing.

trainings.name: Tempo Intervals
trainings.description: 3x10min @ 80-85% FTP with 5min recovery. Build sustained power.

trainings.name: Big Gear Climbing Intervals
trainings.description: 5x6min @ 70rpm in Z3 with 3min recovery. Build climbing-specific strength.

trainings.name: Big Gear Climbing Intervals
trainings.description: 6x5min @ 70rpm in Z3 with 3min recovery. Build climbing-specific strength.
